extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization part of the HPH sector or other critical infrastructure?

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Asset Management and Security
extracted_playbook.description: Develop and maintain an asset management policy to reduce the risk of exposing vulnerabilities, devices, or services that could be exploited by threat actors.

extracted_playbook.title: Enhance Identity Management and Device Security
extracted_playbook.description: Secure devices and digital accounts, manage online access to protect sensitive data and PII/PHI from compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Establish Vulnerability, Patch, and Configuration Management
extracted_playbook.description: Mitigate known vulnerabilities and establish secure configuration baselines to reduce the likelihood of threat actors exploiting known vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization a software manufacturer?

extracted_playbook.title: Embed Security into Product Architecture
extracted_playbook.description: Integrate security throughout the entire software development lifecycle (SDLC).

extracted_playbook.title: Eliminate Default Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Require administrators to set a strong password during installation and configuration to eliminate default passwords.

extracted_playbook.title: Create Secure Configuration Templates
extracted_playbook.description: Provide configuration templates with safe settings based on risk appetite and support them with hardening guides.

extracted_playbook.title: Design Products for Compromise Resilience
extracted_playbook.description: Design products so that the compromise of a single security control does not result in compromise of the entire system.

extracted_playbook.title: Mandate MFA for Privileged Users
extracted_playbook.description: Mandate phishing-resistant MFA for privileged users and make it a default feature.
